div.div: Number and percentage of marine mammal and sea turtle populations protected under the ESA that significantly increased (inc), non-significantly change (nsc), and significantly decreased (dec) after listing.
div.p: (A) Calculations were based on 23 marine mammal and 8 sea turtle representative populations of ESA-listed species that met our selection criteria. (B) Relationship between population trend and time since listing for marine mammal (blue circles) and sea turtle (green circles) populations. Black line is the median and grey circle the mean.
